duties_responsibilities.duty: Design, implement, and maintain network infrastructure while collaborating with networking vendors.
Manage vendor relationships and contribute to the stability, scalability, and security of the organization's network.
Handle MS support team escalations and participate in project work.
Collaborate on customer outages and report to IT Director.
Need to have own vehicle for travel.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field (Master's preferred)
